screen:
-= Info about application 'ResetCDR' =-
[Synopsis] Resets the Call Data Record
[Description] ResetCDR([options]): This application causes the Call Data Record to be reset. Options: w -- Store the current CDR record before resetting it. a -- Store any stacked records. v -- Save CDR variables. e -- Enable CDR only (negate effects of NoCDR).
